name: Peyote Coyote and the Desert of Depuration
name_original: Peyote Coyote and the Desert of Depuration
description:
Peyote Coyote and the Desert of Depuration is the second out of three parts, created as a visual accompaniment to the Peyote Coyote EP release. 

Follow the coyote through their own personal hell, where they reflect upon their internalised toxicity and understands that they can't go through everything alone.

Warning! This games contains flashing lights, colors and imagery.

Play Part 1: Peyote Coyote and the Desert of Deprivation here!

Play Part 3: Peyote Coyote and the Desert of Dissipation here!

Creators:

Rebecka Jansson @mercworm

Jamie Bolling @Slemhosta
